alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 15 at 10:35AM CST until December 17 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 3.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this evening to 4.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning to 3.7 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 3.8 Thu 5 am CST 4.1 3.9 3.7 &&
